title: Fun TV Shows for Christmas Time
summary: Christmas is a time when families watch special TV shows together. This article talks about some fun programs to see over the holidays. There is a comedy show called Two Doors Down about funny neighbors having a Christmas special. A new movie called Finding Father Christmas is about a boy who believes in Santa and tries to prove he is real. The Princess of Wales hosts a carol service with singing and readings. Kate Winslet is making a new Christmas film too. These shows help people enjoy the festive season until a popular show called The Traitors starts in January.
